history.proof: intros a H1 b H2 H3. unfold is_sqr in H1. destruct H1 as [H1 H1']. destruct H1' as [i [H4 H5]]. hauto lq: on use: prime_mult, divide_sqr.

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: apply Gauss with (a := b) (b := a) (c := i) in H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall a b c : Z, (a | b * c) -> rel_prime a b -> (a | c)" on hypothesis of type "(b | a)".

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "i * i" in H2.

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "i * a / b" in the current goal.

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment a : Z H1 : 0 <= a i : Z H4 : i * i = a H5 : 0 <= i b : Z H2 : i * a / b = i * (a / b) H3 : prime b Unable to unify "(Z.abs ?M1865 ?= Z.abs ?M1866) = Gt -> False" with "exists z : Z, a = z * (b * b)".

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment a : Z H1 : 0 <= a i : Z H4 : i * i = a H5 : 0 <= i b : Z H2 : i * a / b = i * (a / b) H3 : prime b Unable to unify "Zis_gcd ?M1866 ?M1865 1" with "exists z : Z, a = z * (b * b)".

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment a : Z H1 : 0 <= a i : Z H4 : i * i = a H5 : 0 <= i b : Z H2 : i * a / b = i * (a / b) H3 : prime b Unable to unify "Zis_gcd ?M1865 ?M1867 1" with "exists z : Z, a = z * (b * b)".

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment a : Z H1 : 0 <= a i : Z H4 : i * i = a H5 : 0 <= i b : Z H2 : i * a / b = i * (a / b) H3 : prime b Unable to unify "i * (b * b)" with "a".

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite Zdivide_Zdiv_eq with (a := b) (b := a); auto.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "a" in the current goal.

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros a H1 b H2 H3.
apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto.

original: intros a H1 b H2 H3. unfold is_sqr in H1. unfold is_sqr. destruct H1 as [H1 H1']. destruct H1' as [i [H4 H5]]. split. - apply Gauss with (a := b) (b := a) (c := i) in H2. + apply Zdivide_Zdiv_eq_2 with (c := i) in H2; auto. rewrite H4 in H2. rewrite H2. apply Zdivide_bounds; auto. + apply rel_prime_sym. apply prime_rel_prime; auto. - exists i. split. + rewrite Zdivide_Zdiv_eq with (a := b) (b := a); auto. + auto.
